forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 3C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 55F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
